name: Wifi Remote Play
short_description:
Wifi Remote Play is a remote control app for Symbian (Nokia S60 5th edition smartphones or later) and Android, allowing you to control Media Player Classic (MPC) or VLC over a wireless network.

This software is completely free - no ads, or having to pay for extra features, unlike many competing players!

Downloaded over 2,000,000 times since 25 January 2012! Available from the Nokia Store for Symbian, and Google Play for Android (see links above).

Wifi Remote Play is free, but if you would like to make a donation, you can do so by buying my donation apps:

Nokia Store / Symbian - http://store.ovi.com/content/394964
Google Play / Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=harman.mark.donation

You can do so via PayPal/credit or debit card at http://sourceforge.net/donate/?user_id=439017 , or donate via Bitcoin ( 1LKCFto9SQGqtcvqZxHkqDPqNjSnfMmsow ).
summary: Remote Control App for MPC and VLC, for Symbian and Android
